TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_smtunux, title = smtunux, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/smtunux} }

S.FORM: smtunux hwananaq qu laqi qani, ini balay ptuqi, mtkari krryax qu pincwaga nya, smtunux iyal, phswa saku bla la.
smtonox hwananaq qo laqi qani, ini balay ptoqi, mtkari krryax qo pincwaga nya, smtonox iyal, phswa sako bla la.
